snippet: Store owners in a Massachusetts town proposing to bar the sale of all tobacco products objected to the proposal on Tuesday, a day after local officials announced the planned ban....

headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Town's Plan to Ban Tobacco Sales Riles Store Owners
headline.main: Massachusetts Town's Plan to Ban Tobacco Sales Riles Store Owners

lead_paragraph: Store owners in a Massachusetts town proposing to bar the sale of all tobacco products objected to the proposal on Tuesday, a day after local officials announced the planned ban.
